title: Bai Tuo Le, Nan Zhu Bie Guo Lai
overview: College student Meng Qingqing complained passionately about the vicious female supporting role in the novel - Meng Ci, but accidentally passed through the book and became Meng Ci. In order to return to the reality from the world in the book, Meng Ci began to match the hero and heroine of the original book with all his strength
